column1: People in Jail and Prison in Spring 2021 Data Appendix

This sheet contains counts of the number of people under state and federal prison jurisdiction at the end of the month for December 2018 and 2019, as well as March, April, June, September, December 2020, and March 2021.
See three reports for jurisdictional notes and methodology: People in Jail and Prison in Spring 2021, People in Jail and Prison 2020, and Prison People in Prison in 2019.
Note: Alaska, Connecticut, Delaware, Hawaii, Rhode Island, and Vermont operate unified prison and jail systems. These states are less comparable to the other states.
